snippet: Visiting a toy factory in Hatfield, Pa., President Obama used a campaign tactic to turn up the heat on Republicans as he promotes his tax plan.
abstract: Pres Obama visits toy factory in Hatfield, Pa, to rally crowd to support his deficit-reduction tax plan; trip is seen as continuation of tactic employed by Obama in his re-election campaign, where he used public support to turn up heat on Republican lawmakers.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and JONATHAN WEISMAN
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Hatfield, Pa., and Jonathan Weisman from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Visiting a toy factory in Hatfield, Pa., President Obama used a campaign tactic to turn up the heat on Republicans as he promotes his tax plan.

headline.seo: Obama Takes His Deficit Fight to the Public
headline.main: In Latest Campaign, Obama Takes Deficit Battle to the Public
headline.print_headline: In Latest Campaign, Obama Takes Deficit Battle to the Public
